
```{r}
library(dplyr)

global_var <- "78931"

starting_df <- data.frame(
  level = c('UG', 'GR'),
  total = c(1234, 543)
)

final_df <- as.data.frame(t(starting_df)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(ug_total = V1,
                gr_total = V2) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(new_var = global_var) %>%
  tail(n=1)

rownames(final_df) <- NULL
  

```
